idea:
ChangeMatrix is an all women initiative, a movement to harness the knowledge of a new emerging set of teachers, beyond academics, across time zones, without boundaries. We aspire to bring this change into the lives of millions, by utilizing technology and making convenient and appropriate education easily accessible. 


We are witnessing a structural shift in the human capital marketplace, worldwide. Serious gaps are observed between elite education credentials and actual individual competence, challenging the myth that higher education leads to higher employment and better jobs. Great knowledge is not always synonymous with great skill. 


Our goal is to educate people in knowledge intensive industries. This is how the human capital will become more efficient and effective.
name: CHANGE MATRIX

name: The Indian Make

idea: Transforming your daily comfort foods into healthier indulgences
name: 100PERCENT NOURISHMENT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
The Sports Republic is sports digital media company, which is run entirely by sports fans, producing original and real-time sports related content for sports fans while capturing authentic opinions and emotions of sports fans.


We are a sports crazy fan movement, motivated towards engaging & entertaining sports fans on our digital & social media platforms with interactive, unconventional & authentic content to help fans connect with their favorite sports & players and with other fans in the most awesome way possible.


As India strides rapidly towards being a major sports powerhouse, dedicated sports fans are moving away from consuming traditional mainstream sports content, and are moving towards more dynamic & interactive digital platforms for their regular dose of sports action.


Our aim to create and engage dedicated fan communities of various sports like cricket, football, kabaddi, basketball and others, by producing unique, unconventional and most importantly, non-conformist sports content and to create an alternative culture of fan engagement that creates conversations.


In the process, we also aim to help sports companies and other brands to connect with their youthful and aspirational sports audience in a creative way.
name: The Sports Republic

idea: ONESPIDER TECHNOLOGIES LLP stands with the vision “ONE NATION ONE CODE & ONE NATION ONE SOFTWARE”. ONESPIDER brings in massive innovation in the field of Computer software & solutions, Internet / Web based / Mobile Applications looking after end-to-end Software Development cycle which will focus on different verticals of Retail business and creating a network between Retailers, Distributors and Manufacturers by providing a single software solution to all their business needs.
name: ONESPIDER TECHNOLOGIES LLP
